Gabriela: I'm so sorry. I shouldn't have called you.
Caleb: Why did you?

Gabriela: Jamal came to me. He wanted me to tell you that Eve was having her

They have no idea.
Gabriela: What are you going to do now?

Caleb: Make them suffer for trying to keep me from my destiny. Then I'm going

Karen: Frank felt it in a room that didn't even have a window.
Chris: The wind. Is this some kind of joke?
Frank: Yeah, I checked around the hospital. No one else felt it.

Alison: All of us. Caleb's coming for all of us.
Caleb: Now, is this any way to greet your husband?

Lucy: Oh, right, kind of, what, like losing touch with an old pal?
Jamal: So what are you saying? Caleb himself never showed up, he's not here?
Gabriela: That's right.
Jamal: Well, I guess she tried.

Gabriela: You're wrong, Lucy. You don't know Caleb like I do.
Lucy: I thought you just said you lost your connection with him.

Gabriela: It's not like that!
Lucy: Back off.
Gabriela: Ow!

Gabriela: Never!
Jamal: Gabby, come on, please tell us.

Gabriela: You can't stop him. None of you can! You were stupid to think that

Jack: She's not yours and she never will be.

Caleb: Just stretching. Don't worry, I'm going to take my time with you all

Eve: I -- I thought I was in labor. I was wrong.

Eve: What are you going to do?

Eve: Michael? Michael. I know you're in there, Michael.

Caleb: Michael's gone.

Chris: Come on.
Caleb: Very interesting.

Jack: No, no. No, you're not going to go see him.
Livvie: Jack, I can't let him come after all of you.

Jack: He's going to anyway, Livvie. He knows we're trying to set him up. He

Jack: He's going to try to kill us because we messed up his destiny, which he

Jack: I'm counting on it.

Jack: I know that you're probably scared about Caleb's hold on you.

Jack: By loving each other. And if we trust in that, then I know we can beat

Jack: Do you remember what we talked about? Huh?

Jack: Yes. Yes.

Jack: Yes, our dreams, what we're going to do when this whole thing is over.
